issue.title: Missing description of packaged_task member swap, missing non-member swap

discussion.p: Class template packaged_task in shows a member swap declaration, but misses to document it's effects (No prototype provided). Further on this class misses to provide a non-member swap.

blockquote.p: Alisdair notes that paragraph 2 of the proposed resolution has already been applied in the current Working Draft.
We note a pending future-related paper by Detlef; we would like to wait for this paper before proceeding.

discussion.note: 2009-05-24 Daniel removed part 2 of the proposed resolution.
discussion.blockquote: Move to Tentatively Ready, removing bullet 3 from the proposed resolution but keeping the other two bullets.
Moved to NAD Editorial. Rationale added below.

li.p: In , immediately after the definition of class template packaged_task add:

pre.ins: template<class R, class... Argtypes> void swap(packaged_task<R(ArgTypes...)>&, packaged_task<R(ArgTypes...)>&);

li.p: At the end of (after p. 20), add add the following prototype description:

pre.ins: template<class R, class... Argtypes> void swap(packaged_task<R(ArgTypes...)>& x, packaged_task<R(ArgTypes...)>& y);
